import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import React from 'react'; import { useGetProductDetailsQuery } from "../slices/productsApiSlice"; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; const ProductDetail = () => { const {id: productId} = useParams(); const [qty, setQty] = useState const {data: product, isLoading, error} = useGetProductDetailsQuery(productId); return ( <> Go Back { isLoading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error?.data?.message || error.error} ) : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: { product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out Of Stock'} )} ) } export default ProductDetail
